Live is going on, education, career, and family.

Fulva and Us.

Fulva is the latin word for wild lily, the kind of flower bearing the meaning of forever happiness. we named our three year old girl, Hope, in the Japanese name of the flower. And

My husband and I we always want to spend as much time as we can with her before she goes to the real world. As we all know, it is very difficult to balance work *money, passion when you have a family. But we wanted to try achieving the balance. This is how our two room hotel project coming up. As a trained professional in Hospitality, I will dedicate my passion in Hospitality to run this business and also raising up Hope.
